Gameplay
========

High level gameplay is quite simple, and information is found in the home page of this documentation. Below we'll go into some of the nuances to the game.

Start
-----

The start to the camelup game is randomized. Each camel is rolled and placed on a tile according to that roll from 1 to 3. The happens behind the scenes before the game screen is exposed.

Game Screen
-----------

Here some basics of the game screen:

.. image:: img/game_info.png

Robot Plays
-----------

The robot will play immediately after the play of a human player. Because of this it may seem like you do not know what the robot played. Checkout the text panel to understand what move the robot made and what utility (total coins) the robot thinks that move will achieve.
